user.title: Digital Pendulum Setup
user.description: The pendulum will operate between the set start and end times

data.tts_entity: TTS Entity (for Media Player / Browser Mod)

data_description.tts_entity: Required only for Media Player type (e.g. tts.google_translate_en_com)
data_description.custom_chime_path: E.g.: www/sounds/bell.mp3 (Formats: MP3, WAV, OGG - leave empty for default)
data_description.chime_delay: Wait time between chime and voice announcement. Default: 3 s.
data_description.volume: Volume 1–100 %. Set to 0 to keep device volume unchanged. Default: 15 %.
data_description.announce_interval: How often to announce the time: every hour, every 30 or 15 minutes.
data_description.day_announce_hour: At which full hour the day-of-week name is appended to the announcement.
data_description.pause_for_announcement: If the player is playing, it will be paused before the announcement and resumed afterwards.
